alert.note: Alert for Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 12:01PM PST until March 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph into Wednesday evening. Winds becoming Northwest to north 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph Thursday morning and afternoon. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 6 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds may fall below criteria levels for a period Wednesday night before increasing again on Thursday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
